##Diary of the siege of Wuhan | Day twenty-one

Techread

Features, Lanxi, founder of zhulu.com  , focuses on in-depth observations and business reviews of Internet startups, new media, and subcultures.

The residential areas in Wuhan have gradually been closed, and my residence is no exception. Originally, most of the non-residents had not returned to Florida, so it became more desolate and stayed until the scattered lights hung on the buildings at night, like a candle that has been lit, trying to prove that people are still alive.

The joy of life, Wang Zengqi once wrote, was "to see live chickens and ducks, fresh watermelons and vegetables, red chilies, alive and crowded, " and to think that an epidemic had made such little pleasures impossible, to keep people at arm's length is, on the contrary, a responsible and noble courtesy.

There is an air of unreality that makes one want to reach the end, find and open the door that blends into the background, and look up and say, "Good Morning, good afternoon, and good night. ".

The fact that The Truman Show and Kim Kighley tried to win an Oscar in the first place doesn't stop the film's allegorical value from feeling old-fashioned whenever it's reviewed.

It's also sometimes wondered if Wuhan was on a major reality show, with countless cameras pointed at the plot of the show, onlookers pressing the vote button to rate each character, and social media buzz, it's helped the ratings keep climbing.

The problem with this idea is that, by rights, the most hated characters voted out of the show quickly, but so far, the show's most reviled characters seem to be alive

All right, no more jokes.

According to Zhong Nanshan, the time it took for the epidemic to be resolved was in April -- a period that would take almost a quarter to complete.

For many, it has been an unusually long season, and some have been unlucky enough not to make it through the season without a chance to see the flowers bloom.

The Chinese media are said to have shied away from the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses's formal name for the COVID-19: The SARS-COV-2, which translates as the second Atypical pneumonia.

The Atypical pneumonia in China has created a collective memory akin to that of the scar literature, reawakening a word that connotes discomfiture and, of course, evokes associations that may not be necessary, not to mention arguments that were initially dismissed as rumors, it is the "loose wording" that links new pneumonia to SARS.

In the river of history, such care is little more than a ripple that spreads out and disappears quickly after a stone is thrown in, leaving only the sound of water.

So what is history?

In Benedetto Croce's words, "all true history is contemporary history" . The purpose of recording and reading the past is to overlap with the present. Otherwise, history is just a pile of paper, so Hegel said, "the only lesson that man has learned from history is that he has learned nothing from history. " .

Pain is certainly not a good thing, but it is also the most worthy of inheritance perception, no pain memory, will not know how to love themselves, so that repeatedly in the same place fell.

Experience the existence of an era, is to witness that a rustle down the dust, are overpowering what.

This is my diary of the siege of Wuhan, Day twenty-one.
